TeamPerk:tpid_bioenergysource.Name: TPID_BioEnergySource
TeamPerk:tpid_bioenergysource.ItemDescription: Recover Shield equal to 0.2% of Energy lost.

TeamPerk:tpid_blakebeardsstash.Name: TPID_BlakebeardsStash
TeamPerk:tpid_blakebeardsstash.ItemDescription: Eliminations have a 5% chance to uncover one of Blakebeard's stashes. Search them to find Peg Legs, Coconuts, and Cannonball Grenades.

TeamPerk:tpid_blastfromthepast.Name: TPID_BlastFromThePast
TeamPerk:tpid_blastfromthepast.ItemDescription: Removes all shield and increases Max Health by 200%.

TeamPerk:tpid_boombase.Name: TPID_BOOMBASE
TeamPerk:tpid_boombase.ItemDescription: B.A.S.E. blasts Steel Wool music, increasing Damage by 12% and Critical Rating by 15 for allies within 5 tiles.

TeamPerk:tpid_coolcustomer.Name: TPID_CoolCustomer
TeamPerk:tpid_coolcustomer.ItemDescription: With Stay Frosty active, using an ability reduces Cooldown of all abilities by 3 seconds and ends Stay Frosty.

TeamPerk:tpid_dangerdanger.Name: TPID_DangerDanger
TeamPerk:tpid_dangerdanger.ItemDescription: Z.A.P. has your back, dealing 105 base Energy Damage to a random enemy every 6 seconds.

TeamPerk:tpid_dimmak.Name: TPID_DimMak
TeamPerk:tpid_dimmak.ItemDescription: Shadow Stance regenerates 1.8% Shield per second.

TeamPerk:tpid_endlessshadow.Name: TPID_EndlessShadow
TeamPerk:tpid_endlessshadow.ItemDescription: Increases Shadow Stance Duration by 4 seconds.

TeamPerk:tpid_holidaycheer.Name: TPID_HolidayCheer
TeamPerk:tpid_holidaycheer.ItemDescription: Reduces your Ability cooldowns by 40%. Stacks independently from other cooldown reduction perks.

TeamPerk:tpid_huntersinstinct.Name: TPID_HuntersInstinct
TeamPerk:tpid_huntersinstinct.ItemDescription: Eliminations during Evening or Night grant 0.2% Damage and 0.1% Melee Life Leech, up to 40 stacks. These bonuses last until Night ends.

TeamPerk:tpid_keepout.Name: TPID_KeepOut
TeamPerk:tpid_keepout.ItemDescription: Frag Grenade leaves an energized area dealing 18 base Energy Damage per second for 6 Seconds. Base Radius is 0.375 tiles and increases by 40% with each match.

TeamPerk:tpid_kineticoverdrive.Name: TPID_KineticOverdrive
TeamPerk:tpid_kineticoverdrive.ItemDescription: Kinetic Overload occurs an additional time.

TeamPerk:tpid_longarmofthelaw.Name: TPID_LongArmOfTheLaw
TeamPerk:tpid_longarmofthelaw.ItemDescription: Increases Anti-Material Charge Range by 1 tile(s).

TeamPerk:tpid_nevertellmetheodds.Name: TPID_NeverTellMeTheOdds
TeamPerk:tpid_nevertellmetheodds.ItemDescription: Increases Healing Received by 2.5% for each nearby enemy.

TeamPerk:tpid_onetwopunch.Name: TPID_OneTwoPunch
TeamPerk:tpid_onetwopunch.ItemDescription: Your next Heavy Attack after using an ability costs 20% less Energy.

TeamPerk:tpid_phaseblaster.Name: TPID_PhaseBlaster
TeamPerk:tpid_phaseblaster.ItemDescription: Every 5 seconds, your next shot will fire a Phase Pulse which deals 47 base Energy Damage.

TeamPerk:tpid_preemptivestrike.Name: TPID_PreemptiveStrike
TeamPerk:tpid_preemptivestrike.ItemDescription: Increases Damage by 6.5% against full health enemies.

TeamPerk:tpid_recycling.Name: TPID_Recycling
TeamPerk:tpid_recycling.ItemDescription: B.A.S.E. generates resources based on affected structures. Higher tier structures generate more resources. Interact with B.A.S.E. to collect.

TeamPerk:tpid_roundtrip.Name: TPID_RoundTrip
TeamPerk:tpid_roundtrip.ItemDescription: Throwing Stars return to you, dealing their damage again on the way back.

TeamPerk:tpid_shakeitoff.Name: TPID_ShakeItOff
TeamPerk:tpid_shakeitoff.ItemDescription: Decreases Duration of elemental status effects by 50%.

TeamPerk:tpid_shiftinggears.Name: TPID_ShiftingGears
TeamPerk:tpid_shiftinggears.ItemDescription: Phase Shift has 1 additional charge(s) and Range is decreased by 0.2 tile(s).

TeamPerk:tpid_slowyourroll.Name: TPID_SlowYourRoll
TeamPerk:tpid_slowyourroll.ItemDescription: Freeze melee attackers for 2 second(s). Mist Monsters are slowed by 43%.

TeamPerk:tpid_superchargedtraps.Name: TPID_SuperchargedTraps
TeamPerk:tpid_superchargedtraps.ItemDescription: Increases Damage of traps affected by B.A.S.E. by 8.5%.

TeamPerk:tpid_totallygnarly.Name: TPID_TotallyGnarly
TeamPerk:tpid_totallygnarly.ItemDescription: Rockin' Riff also increases Crit Rating by 160 (decaying over 8 seconds), and Heals 73.8 base health.

TeamPerk:tpid_trickandtreat.Name: TPID_TrickAndTreat
TeamPerk:tpid_trickandtreat.ItemDescription: 50% chance to conjure an extra Phantasm every time you conjure one. In addition, Phantasms have 33% Life Leech.

TeamPerk:tpid_violentinspiration.Name: TPID_ViolentInspiration
TeamPerk:tpid_violentinspiration.ItemDescription: Weapon eliminations increase Weapon Damage by 13% for 15 seconds. Each weapon type can only apply one stack of this effect.
